page.title: 16Farming in Halewood.
page.content: The vast majority of the land in our survey area is farmland. In fact ten of our twelve kilometre squares have farming as the primary land cover. Of these nine are devoted to crops, these crops being barley, corn, hay, oilseed and rape. There is also some potato production and a very small percentage of land given over to dairy cattle. The farms in the area are as follows: Foxhill Farm Spring Farm Springfield Farm Plumpton's Farm Cross Hillocks Farm Tray Ashes Farm Boscoe Hall Farm Brook House Farm Ditton Fold Farm Many of the families who originally ran and owned the farms have now been replaced by new families.
